original: 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas sems can thams cad kyi nad dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byas slar bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs su zhugs so //
